text: Mujjukire olunaku Katonda lwa libakunganya ku lunaku lwe kiyaama, olwo lwe lunaku oluliraga okufaafaganirwa (eri abakafiiri), oyo yenna akkiriza Katonda naakola e mirimu emirungi, Katonda amusangulako ebibibye, era agenda kumuyingiza e jjana ezikulukutiramu e migga, nga baakuzibeeramu lubeerera. Okwo nno kwe kwe siima okuyitirivu
